subject: Re: [samuraihistory] "Anachronistic" Samurai?
msgSnippet: I think the writer is telling us that the term is an anachronism (not in use at that time) and not that the men and their culture were not serving as it

I think the writer is telling us that the term is an anachronism (not in use
at that time) and not that the men and their culture were not "serving" as
it were.

    Tom
